title.rendered: DASH OFFROAD Y62 Patrol  Predator Rear Bar with Tyre Carrier [Textured Black]

content.rendered:
DASH OFFROAD Y62 Patrol Predator Rear Bar with Tyre Carrier [Textured Black]

DASH OffRoad are Y62 industry leaders in designing lightweight parts for the Nissan Patrol. With more than 2 years of development and testing on-road, corrugations and offroad, we are proud to offer the Predator rear bar with a centrally mounted wheel carrier to suit up to a 37″ tyre.Included in the package:

  • A “DASH” independent tow bar rated at 3.5t
  • 150mm forged drop hitch
  • Camera relocation kit
  • Twin rear LED lights
  • Genuine Nissan tow wiring loom

Our Rear bar has a unique 3-piece design with the centre made from steel, compared to the wing facias being made of aluminium, which gives a significant weight reduction.
The lane departure on TiL series 4 is not compatible. For Series 5 Ti and TiL Y62 Patrols the sensor can penetrate aluminium however note the sensitivity is increased.

A Nissan genuine 7 pin flat tow bar wiring harness will also be included. X4 sensor holes have been pre-drilled at 26mm that will suit S4 and S5 models, sensor bezels will be provided.

The Predator rear bar is also compatible with a 120L long range tank. The finish is available in satin black (raw unfinished) for those that choose to colour code locally or a textured black finish that can be fitted directly to the car.

If you have increased your tyre size it can be quite the challenge getting a spare to fit in the factory location, with the greater departure, room for an LRA and rear tyre swing away, this could be the perfect choice for your Y62 Patrol.
